scripts.test: npm run build && if [ -d dist/__tests__ ]; then FILES=$(find dist/__tests__ -type f \( -name "*.test.js" -o -name "*.spec.js" \) | sort | tr '\n' ' '); if [ -z "$FILES" ]; then echo "[SKIP] api tests: no dist/__tests__/*.test.js (Lot L2 not merged or no compiled tests)"; else node --test $FILES; fi; else echo "[SKIP] api tests: dist/__tests__ missing (Lot L2 not merged)"; fi
